item.title: Sproxton Probate Material, 1621-1660
item.description:
This rural village in Leicestershire lies eight miles north-east of Melton Mowbray, on the county border with Lincolnshire.

You may also be interested in Sproxton Probate Material, 1661-1700
item.dc:creator: PamF

item.title: Sproxton Probate Material, 1661-1700
item.description:
This rural village in Leicestershire lies eight miles north-east of Melton Mowbray, on the county border with Lincolnshire.

Transcripts of the following inventories from this period are currently available:

Thomas Brooksby, 1692

George Dad, gentleman, 1670

Richard Dalbye, labourer, 1679

William Heasall,1670

William Hubbart the elder, yeoman, 1670

Edward Pick, 1682

Mary Rouse, 1679

Thomas Taylor, 1670

You may also be interested in Sproxton Probate Material, 1621-60
item.dc:creator: PamF
